availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on December 9, 1826. Served as private in Confederate Army 7th Regiment, Kentucky Mounted Infantry, Company C. Died on September 2, 1900 in McCracken County.

bibl.p: "Find A Grave Index," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QVLM-K1CW), V. A. McCutchen, 1900; Burial, Paducah, McCracken, Kentucky, United States of America, Oak Grove Cemetery; citing record ID 84223865); "United States Civil War Soldiers Index, 1861-1865," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:F9FW-FZD : 4 December 2014), V.A. McCutchen, Private, Company C, 7th Regiment, Kentucky Mounted Infantry, Confederate; citing NARA microfilm publication M377 (Washington D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, n.d.), roll 8; FHL microfilm 881,387.
